title: Braised Andalucian chicken in Spanish olive sauce
ingredients: ['50ml Spanish olive oil', '8 free range chicken thighs', '1 head garlic, thinly sliced', '1 Spanish onion, thinly sliced', '2 teaspoons plain flour', '2 sprigs fresh rosemary', '1 glass dry white wine', 'ground black pepper', '1 glass water', '200g pitted green and pitted black Spanish olives', 'salt']
